summary: Build a supportive app for struggling women to ask hard questions and receive empathetic, compassionate “big sister” style advice.

existing_features.title: Create the core app experience for Ask Big Sister where authenticated users can submit hard-to-ask questions and read compassionate, big-sister style answers.
Add an answering workflow so designated 'Big Sister' moderators can post empathetic answers to user questions from within the app.
Include safety and privacy UX appropriate for a sensitive advice app, including guidance text and an option to post questions without displaying the user’s identity to other users.
Design a cohesive, compassionate visual theme for the app (colors, typography, layout) and apply it consistently across all screens without using a blue/purple primary palette.
Add basic navigation and information architecture: Home (recent questions), Ask (submit a question), and About (what Ask Big Sister is).
Generate and include custom static image assets (logo + a gentle hero illustration) and render them in the UI from the frontend public assets folder.
Add a built-in soothing background music track as a static frontend asset and play it in-app using the browser audio API (no backend involvement).
Provide user controls to start/stop the soothing music and adjust volume, accessible from the main app UI (e.g., in the top navigation bar) with clear English labels.

Ensure background music respects user expectations and browser policies by defaulting to muted/off until the user explicitly starts playback, and persist the user’s preference (play state + volume) locally in the browser.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an app where women can ask hard-to-ask questions and receive empathetic, compassionate big-sister style advice.
